statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT sales_id, product_name, total_price FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, purchase_date FROM SalesData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT sales_id, total_price, purchase_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sales_id = 1
SELECT product_name, total_price FROM SalesData WHERE purchase_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT sales_id, quantity, unit_price FROM SalesData WHERE total_price > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE 'App%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM BuildingMaterials;
SELECT sale_id, material_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM SalesData;
SELECT unit_price, material_name FROM BuildingMaterials ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT quantity_sold, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT material_id, material_name, unit_price FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM BuildingMaterials JOIN SalesData ON BuildingMaterials.material_id = SalesData.material_id GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_sold DESC

SELECT material_name, unit_price, quantity_sold FROM BuildingMaterials JOIN SalesData ON BuildingMaterials.material_id = SalesData.material_id WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC, quantity_sold DESC

SELECT DISTINCT material_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM BuildingMaterials JOIN SalesData ON BuildingMaterials.material_id = SalesData.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING total_sales > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, category_name, price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price, sale_date FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date
SELECT category_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT material_name, supplier_id FROM materials WHERE supplier_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, price, supplier_id FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 3;

SELECT sales.sale_id, materials.material_name, sales.quantity, sales.sale_date FROM sales INNER JOIN materials ON sales.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE sales.quantity >= 100 ORDER BY sales.sale_date ASC;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, suppliers.contact_email, COUNT(sales.sale_id) AS total_sales FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id LEFT JOIN sales ON materials.material_id = sales.material_id GROUP BY suppliers.supplier_id HAVING total_sales > 5;

SELECT materials.material_name, sales_report.total_price, sales_report.quantity_sold FROM materials JOIN sales ON materials.material_id = sales.material_id JOIN sales_report ON sales.sale_id = sales_report.sale_id WHERE sales_report.total_price < 1000 ORDER BY materials.material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, material_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT material_name, price, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT supplier_name, material_supplied FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE price > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT s.rep_name, sd.material_name, sd.quantity, sd.price FROM sales_data sd JOIN sales_representatives s ON sd.sale_id = s.rep_id WHERE sd.price < 500 ORDER BY s.region ASC, sd.sale_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.address, sd.sale_date, sd.quantity * sd.price AS total_amount FROM customers c JOIN sales_data sd ON c.customer_id = sd.sale_id WHERE c.address LIKE '%Street%' AND sd.quantity > 50;

SELECT su.supplier_name, bm.material_category, SUM(sd.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data sd JOIN building_materials bm ON sd.material_name = bm.material_name JOIN supplier su ON bm.material_id = su.supplier_id GROUP BY su.supplier_name, bm.material_category HAVING total_quantity > 2000 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
